verbs.description: hannaford [V: may] be coming to ballston ballston may be getting its first supermarket on wednesday night the town planning board will call a public hearing on hannaford near the intersection of state routes 50 and 67 this is on the same property where a walmart proposal in the fall of 2015 was defeated by residents who did n't want big - box stores nor the traffic they bring hannaford ballston rossi jr ballston new york frank rossi jr
